properties.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
properties.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 2 at 1:05PM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low
as 28 possible.

* WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland
Empire and San Diego County Valleys.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Watch, from Monday evening through Tuesday
morning then again Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing

NWSheadline: FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
